mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strutting into a local coffee shop, ready to claim my morning fuel. The barista dared to ask me for payment-can you believe the audacity? Without missing a beat, I dramatically flung my arms up in the air, knocking over a display of muffins, and exclaimed, "Payment? Do you know who I am? I am Hot Josh, the CEO of Bank of Entitlement! I don't pay for things, things are paid for me!" The poor barista, trembling in fear, quickly brewed me the fanciest latte on the house. And that, my dear friends, is how you assert your entitlement in style.
